import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter, HashRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplArticle extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { nomArticle: '', poids: '', prixUnitaire: '', prixKg: '', selectedFamilleArticles: '', sousArticle: '', articleCompose: '', articlesDuCompose: '', } } componentDidMount() { let id_article = this.props.location.state.id_article; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_agora/GetArticleById.php?id=' + id_article).then(res => { console.log(res) this.setState({ idArticle: res.data[0][0].id_article, nomArticle: res.data[0][0].nomArticle, poids: res.data[0][0].poids, prixUnitaire: res.data[0][0].prixUnitaire, prixKg: res.data[0][0].prixKg, selectedFamilleArticles: res.data[1][0].label, sousArticle: res.data[2], articleCompose: res.data[3][0].nom_article, articlesDuCompose: res.data[4] }) }) } render() { return (
